ECE366 Fall 2018 mini MIPS disassembler
----------
ADDRESS   :  BINARY  
0x00000000:  0010 0000 0000 1000 1111 1111 1111 0001
Instruction: addi $8,$0,-15
next_PC = 0x00000004

0x00000004:  0000 0000 0000 1000 0100 1000 0010 0010
Instruction: sub $9,$0,$8
next_PC = 0x00000008

0x00000008:  0010 0001 0010 1001 1111 1111 1111 1110
Instruction: addi $9,$9,-2
next_PC = 0x0000000c

0x0000000c:  0000 0000 0000 1001 0101 0000 0010 1010
Instruction: slt $10,$0,$9
next_PC = 0x00000010

0x00000010:  0001 0001 0100 0000 0000 0000 0000 0001
Instruction: beq $10,$0,1
If $10 == $0, then next_PC = 0x00000018
Else next_PC = 0x 00000014

0x00000014:  0000 1000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0010
Instruction: j 2
next_PC = 0x00000008

0x00000018:  0001 0001 0010 0000 0000 0000 0000 0010
Instruction: beq $9,$0,2
If $9 == $0, then next_PC = 0x00000024
Else next_PC = 0x 0000001c

0x0000001c:  0010 0000 0000 1010 1111 1111 1111 1111
Instruction: addi $10,$0,-1
next_PC = 0x00000020

0x00000020:  0000 1000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 1100
Instruction: j 12
next_PC = 0x00000030

0x00000024:  0000 0000 0000 0000 0101 0000 0010 0000
Instruction: add $10,$0,$0
next_PC = 0x00000028

0x00000028:  0000 1000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 1100
Instruction: j 12
next_PC = 0x00000030

0x0000002c:  0010 0000 0000 1010 0000 0000 0000 0001
Instruction: addi $10,$0,1
next_PC = 0x00000030

>>>
